backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file listing implemented frontend features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining OKLCH color variables, theming, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, meta tags, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout containing hero, navigation, collection section, benefits, order form, contact section, and scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Component rendering a responsive grid of product categories with images and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Card showing contact details with mailto and Instagram action buttons.
frontend/src/components/OrderNowForm.tsx: Full order form with validation, email body generation, mailto submission, and clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseSection: Grid of value‑proposition cards with icons and short descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query methods are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with a warm craft color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, containers, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, required images, and implemented features for the CraftyMini landing page.
